name: mymaid-ec10
description: MyMaid - Nền tảng kết nối dịch vụ giúp việc chuyên nghiệp

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd server && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../client && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run check-env
scripts.stop:legacy: taskkill /f /im node.exe 2>nul && echo "Killed all Node.js processes" && netstat -ano | findstr :3000 | findstr LISTENING >nul && for /f "tokens=5" %a in ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :3000 ^| findstr LISTENING') do taskkill /f /pid %a 2>nul && echo "Cleared port 3000" || echo "Port 3000 is free" && netstat -ano | findstr :5000 | findstr LISTENING >nul && for /f "tokens=5" %a in ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :5000 ^| findstr LISTENING') do taskkill /f /pid %a 2>nul && echo "Cleared port 5000" || echo "Port 5000 is free"
scripts.stop:all: npm run stop && echo "All Node.js processes and ports have been cleared"
scripts.clear-ports: netstat -ano | findstr :3000 | findstr LISTENING >nul && for /f "tokens=5" %a in ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :3000 ^| findstr LISTENING') do taskkill /f /pid %a 2>nul && echo "Cleared port 3000" || echo "Port 3000 is free" && netstat -ano | findstr :5000 | findstr LISTENING >nul && for /f "tokens=5" %a in ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :5000 ^| findstr LISTENING') do taskkill /f /pid %a 2>nul && echo "Cleared port 5000" || echo "Port 5000 is free"
scripts.kill:ports: netstat -ano | findstr :3000 | findstr LISTENING >nul && for /f "tokens=5" %a in ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :3000 ^| findstr LISTENING') do taskkill /f /pid %a 2>nul && echo "Killed process on port 3000" || echo "No process on port 3000" && netstat -ano | findstr :5000 | findstr LISTENING >nul && for /f "tokens=5" %a in ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :5000 ^| findstr LISTENING') do taskkill /f /pid %a 2>nul && echo "Killed process on port 5000" || echo "No process on port 5000"

author: MyMaid Team
